snippet.title: Hellsweeper VR - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: Watch the new trailer for the first-person action-combat VR game Hellsweeper VR. Engage in a virtual reality experience that combines action horror with rich combat mechanics, offering a unique and intense gameplay cocktail. Hellsweeper VR is launching on September 21 for PlayStation VR2, Meta Quest, Steam VR, and VivePort.
